faq.noAnswer: Didn't find the answer to your question?

questions.faq-01: How much commission does Tutor charge?
questions.faq-02: When and how are the services performed charged?
questions.faq-05: Are services offered at my home or do I have to go to my guardian's home?
questions.faq-06: Is there a minimum or maximum age to work with Tutor?
questions.faq-07: What kind of services are offered in Tutor?
questions.faq-09: How do I contact the tutor?
questions.faq-10: Why can't I ask more questions on a tutor's profile?
questions.faq-11: Why don't I see addresses when creating a service?
questions.faq-12: Why don't I see addresses when requesting a service?
questions.faq-13: Why don't I see my question/review on the tutor profile?

answers.faq-02: The payment of the service is instantaneous. Once the customer pays for the service, the money is credited to your Mercado Pago account.
answers.faq-03: Tutor is an app that connects plant owners with plant keepers.
answers.faq-04: The application works in the Rep√∫blica Argentina.
answers.faq-05: Services can be offered at your home or at the guardian's home (even online), depending on the service you choose.
answers.faq-06: In order to work with Tutor, you must be over 18 years of age.
answers.faq-07: Tutor offers plant care, counseling and design services. You can also find nursery and special care services, as well as personalized services.
answers.faq-08: The price of services is set by the tutor.
answers.faq-09: The tutor's contact details are shared once the service is accepted by the tutor.
answers.faq-10: To avoid spam, questions can only be asked once the previous question has been answered.
answers.faq-11: In order to finish configuring a service at your home, you must have at least one address uploaded to your account. You can upload an address from the address section.
answers.faq-12: In order to select an address, you need to have at least one address uploaded to your account. You can upload an address from the address section.
answers.faq-13: Your question / review may have been reported by other users. We remind you that offensive or non-service related questions / reviews are not allowed.

login.passwordLength: The password must be between 6 and 20 characters.

login.passwordRequirements: The password must have at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one special character, and one number.
